body:
<!-- This form is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! 

If you're looking for help check [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/kubernetes) and the [troubleshooting guide](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/debug-application-cluster/troubleshooting/).
-->

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:
/kind bug


**What happened**:
If start apiserver with ImagePolicyWebhook  admission enabled , and no configuration provided, apiserver would panic:
```
I1109 15:30:58.799478  104950 initialization.go:90] enabled Initializers feature as part of admission plugin setup
panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x1 addr=0x20 pc=0x54ec0a]

goroutine 1 [running]:
bufio.(*Reader).fill(0xc420b75380)
	/usr/local/go/src/bufio/bufio.go:97 +0xfa
bufio.(*Reader).Peek(0xc420b75380, 0x1000, 0x1000, 0xc42118e000, 0x1000, 0x1000, 0xc420f9e8e8)
	/usr/local/go/src/bufio/bufio.go:129 +0x67
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/yaml.GuessJSONStream(0x0, 0x0, 0x1000, 0xc420022000, 0xc420f9e9c8, 0x4823d4, 0x47f295, 0x1, 0x2)
	/workspace/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/yaml/decoder.go:329 +0x8a
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/yaml.(*YAMLOrJSONDecoder).Decode(0xc420f9ec08, 0x3bcf160, 0xc4211717a0, 0xa17d4f8, 0xc42106d3f0)
	/workspace/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/yaml/decoder.go:218 +0x4e9
k8s.io/kubernetes/plugin/pkg/admission/imagepolicy.NewImagePolicyWebhook(0x0, 0x0, 0xc420f9ec98, 0xc4206b21b0, 0xc42001f340)
	/workspace/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/plugin/pkg/admission/imagepolicy/admission.go:225 +0xbb
k8s.io/kubernetes/plugin/pkg/admission/imagepolicy.Register.func1(0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x1, 0x0)
	/workspace/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/plugin/pkg/admission/imagepolicy/admission.go:53 +0x39
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/admission.(*Plugins).getPlugin(0xc420167030, 0xc420f4feac, 0x12, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
	/workspace/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/admission/plugins.go:103 +0x182
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/admission.(*Plugins).InitPlugin(0xc420167030, 0xc420f4feac, 0x12, 0x0, 0x0, 0x9e0d6a0, 0xc42117eca0, 0x1, 0xc42117ecc0, 0x0, ...)
	/workspace/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/admission/plugins.go:149 +0x7d
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/admission.(*Plugins).NewFromPlugins(0xc420167030, 0xc420874900, 0x9, 0x9, 0x9e0d720, 0xc420b85180, 0x9e0d6a0, 0xc42117eca0, 0x0, 0x411a42, ...)
	/workspace/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/admission/plugins.go:131 +0x126
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/server/options.(*AdmissionOptions).ApplyTo(0xc420acec60, 0xc420f48d00, 0x9e56f80, 0xc42108f830, 0xc4203fd4a0, 0xc42001fec0, 0xc42117ec60, 0x2, 0x2, 0xc42116f0e0, ...)
	/workspace/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/server/options/admission.go:110 +0x4b8
k8s.io/kubernetes/cmd/kube-apiserver/app.BuildGenericConfig(0xc42040a000, 0xc420a7ec30, 0x0, 0x0, 0x2, 0x1, 0x0, 0x1, 0xc420a3c410, 0xc420fcef30, ...)
	/workspace/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/cmd/kube-apiserver/app/server.go:480 +0x106c
k8s.io/kubernetes/cmd/kube-apiserver/app.CreateKubeAPIServerConfig(0xc42040a000, 0x0, 0x0, 0xc420a7ec30, 0x0, 0x0, 0xc420274a80, 0x5f, 0xb1, 0x5f, ...)
	/workspace/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/cmd/kube-apiserver/app/server.go:268 +0xb0
k8s.io/kubernetes/cmd/kube-apiserver/app.CreateServerChain(0xc42040a000, 0xc420acf2c0, 0xc420f9f908, 0x1, 0x1)
	/workspace/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/cmd/kube-apiserver/app/server.go:133 +0x8d
k8s.io/kubernetes/cmd/kube-apiserver/app.Run(0xc42040a000, 0xc420acf2c0, 0xc420f9f9e8, 0xc420fcee10)
	/workspace/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/cmd/kube-apiserver/app/server.go:119 +0xfa
main.NewKubeAPIServer.func1(0xc420acf500, 0xc420fad800, 0x0, 0x20, 0xc420acf2c0, 0x0, 0xc420acf380)
	/workspace/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/cmd/hyperkube/kube-apiserver.go:35 +0x34
main.(*HyperKube).Run(0xc420988480, 0xc420010250, 0x20, 0x20, 0xc420acf2c0, 0x0, 0x0)
	/workspace/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/cmd/hyperkube/hyperkube.go:193 +0x408
main.(*HyperKube).RunToExit(0xc420988480, 0xc420010240, 0x22, 0x24)
	/workspace/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/cmd/hyperkube/hyperkube.go:205 +0x57
main.main()
	/workspace/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/cmd/hyperkube/main.go:49 +0x5ec
```

**What you expected to happen**:
Return error in a graceful way

/sig apps

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Apps.

title: Apiserver would panic if ImagePolicyWebhook enabled and no configuration provided
